action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Committee on the Judiciary to inquire whether the House of Representatives should impeach Emmet G. Sullivan, a judge on the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia presiding over the trial and sentencing of former National Security Advisor Michael T. Flynn.
